John Doe
Backend Engineer with 5+ years experience in Go, PostgreSQL, Redis, REST APIs, and AWS.
- Built microservices with Go and chi; used pgx and Redis for caching and queues.
- Implemented AI features (OpenAI/OpenRouter) integrating embeddings and RAG.
- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, observability (Prometheus, OTEL).
- Collaborated with FE teams; wrote documentation and tests.
